questions.test_question: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by feeling, nervous, anxious or on edge?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often are you unable to stop or control worrying?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often are worrying too much about different things?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often are you having trouble relaxing?
Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been so restless it is hard to sit still?
Over the last 2 weeks are you becoming easily annoyed or irritated?
Over the last 2 weeks have you felt afraid as if something terrible might happen?
Over the last 3 weeks, have you had litttle interest or please in doing things?
Over the last 3 weeks, have you been feeling down, depressed or hopeless
Over the last 3 weeks, have you had trouble falling or staying asleep or have been sleeping too much?
Over the last 3 weeks, have you had a poor appetite or have been overeating?
Over the last 3 weeks, have you been feeling bad about yourself? or that you have been a failure or let yourself? or that you have let yourself or others down?
Over the last 3 weeks, have you had trouble concentrating on things such as reading a newspaper or watching television?
Over the last 3 weeks, have you been moving or speaking slowly that people noticed? or on the other end, have you been so moving around more than usual?
Over the last 3 weeks, have you thought that you would be better off dead or hurting yourself?
Over the past 2 weeks, have you had difficulty falling asleep?
Over the past 2 weeks, have you had difficulty staying asleep?
Over the past 2 weeks, have you had problems waking up too early?
Over the past 2 weeks, how satisfied have you been with your current sleep pattern?
Over the past 2 weeks, to what extent do you consider your sleep problem to interfere with your daily functioning?
Over the past 2 weeks, how noticable do you think your sleeping problem is to other people?
Over the past 2 weeks, how worried or distressed are you about your current sleep problem?
